DataElement.preferredName: Vineland Adaptive Behavior Scales Fine Motor Raw Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Value representing the Fine Motor Raw Score of responses on the Vineland-3 Adaptive Behavior Scales form.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Vineland Adaptive Behavior Scales Fine Motor Skills Raw Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An instrument for evaluation of social functioning in individuals from preschool to 18 years old. Focusing on adaptive behaviors, the results are meant to support the diagnosis of intellectual and developmental disabilities._The ability to control the movement of the small muscles of the fingers and hands._Not processed or refined._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
